func.title: GetMaterialVal

param.name: entry
param.desc: Name of the entry to be retrieved.

param.name: section
param.desc: Section of the entry to be retrieved. If not specified, all sections will be searched for an entry of the specified name.

param.name: material
param.desc: Number of the material of which to retrieve an entry.

param.name: entry_number
param.desc: Index of the value to be retrieved if an entry contains multiple values.

func.desc: Returns the property value of a material definition by its name in the material file.

example.text: Tests whether the landscape on the right of the calling clonk can be blasted away.
